trans-unit.source: Specifies the set of modifier keys.
trans-unit.target: Specifica l'insieme di tasti di modifica.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.Modifiers%2A> property on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard> class is the set of the modifier keys that are currently pressed.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.Modifiers%2A> proprietà la <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard> classe è il set di tasti di modifica che attualmente premuti.

trans-unit.source: Some [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] that make use of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> enumeration are the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.Modifiers%2A> properties on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>, and <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> classes.
trans-unit.target: Alcuni [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] che usano il <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> enumerazione sono il <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.Modifiers%2A> proprietà il <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>, e <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> classi.
Uso della sintassi XAML per gli attributi

trans-unit.source: One or more modifier keys, defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> enumeration, delimited with a "+" character.
trans-unit.target: Uno o più tasti di modifica, definiti per il <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> enumerazione, delimitati con un carattere "+".

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> that associates a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come creare un <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> che associa un <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> con un <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> uses the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> enumeration to specify the modifier key of the gesture.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> utilizza il <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> enumerazione per specificare la chiave di modificatore del movimento.
